name: Lavender Hot Chocolate
description: A unique floral twist on a classic hot chocolate. Comes with a complimentary pillowy vanilla eclair.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup marked with espresso and topped with a caramel drizzle.

name: Matcha Tiramisu
description: Our highly marketed and beloved classic tiramisu with a rich matcha flavor. A must-try!

name: Pillowy Vanilla Eclair
description: A light and airy eclair filled with rich vanilla cream and topped with a delicate glaze.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Thick-cut toast topped with fresh avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
